stages.logText: Halvor asked me to bring him 5 insect wings.
I have given Halvor the 5 insect wings he wanted.
Halvor asked me to bring him 5 rat tails.
I have given Halvor 5 rat tails.
My rat tails weren't good enough for him. He needs more. How much does he really want ?
I refused to bring more rat tails to Halvor. He left Crossglen.
I met Halvor at the foot of a mountain.
Halvor still looks for 5 rat tails. I agreed to help again.
The 5 rat tails I gave him were good enough.
Halvor asked for 4 animal hairs now.
I have given him 4 animal hairs.
Halvor liked only one of my animal hairs. He wants me to bring him 3 more.
I have given up on finding animal hairs that suit Halvor's taste. He has left.
I met Havlor again. He is standing by the lakeside, near an old house, in the north.
Halvor is in bad condition. He asked me to give him a healing potion.
I gave Halvor a small healing potion.
I gave Halvor an healing potion.
I gave Halvor a powerful healing potion.
I gave Halvor a potion made by Lodar.
He is healed.
Halvor still looks for 3 animal hairs.
This time, the animal hairs I gave him were soft enough.
Halvor wants to find two long bones. I'll try to find some.
I have given Halvor two bones, but they weren't long enough. Should I really bring him more bones ?
Halvor left the lakeside when I refused to get him more bones.
Exploring the ruins of Charwood, I stumbled upon Halvor.
He found one long bone since I last met him, but he's still looking for one.
I found a long enough bone, and gave it to Halvor.
Now, Halvor wants me to find 10 scales from Venomscales snakes.
I brought Halvor the 10 Venomscale scales.
Halvor left, asking me to pay a visit to his friend Kayla if I ever come to Stoutford.
